LanguageData.VTE.Name: Name
LanguageData.VTE.DepositOrWithdrawDesc: Positive numbers deposit. Negative numbers withdraw.
LanguageData.VTE.AreYouSureYouWantToDeposit: Are you sure that you want to deposit {0} silver?
LanguageData.VTE.AreYouSureYouWantToWithdraw: Are you sure that you want to withdraw {0} silver?
LanguageData.VTE.BreakdownBankDesc: Performing transactions will incur a charge based on current Bank fee
LanguageData.VTE.BreakdownStockMarketDesc: Buying shares of Trading ships can be risky. Follow the news closely to know how the company you're invested in is doing.
LanguageData.VTE.LoanOptionsUnlockText: Unlocks after putting your money on the deposit
LanguageData.VTE.LoanExplanation: Loans can only be paid back using bank balance. Make sure to have enough money in your bank when the loan time runs out, or repay it in full beforehand. Failing to have enough silver in your bank account and stocks can result in losing goodwill of the bank faction, as well as incur other consequences until the debt is settled.
LanguageData.VTE.IndebtedMessage: Relations with {FACTION_name} became hostile due to being indebted to their bank.
LanguageData.VTE.CollectorsText:
A group of mercenaries have arrived nearby.
They have been hired by {FACTION_name} to encourage you to pay off your debt.
LanguageData.VTE.CollectorsTextPartTwo: Pay off your debt using a trading terminal to stop them from coming back.
LanguageData.VTE.SharesTransactionHeader: Positive numbers buy. Negative numbers sell.
LanguageData.VTE.BankDepositsToSpend: Select bank deposits to pay for shares
LanguageData.VTE.BankDepositsToGain: Select bank deposits to put money from shares
LanguageData.VTE.ContractsExplanation: Completing contracts will have the funds transferred to your bank account(s) and the items removed from your inventory. You need to be quick, as higher mark-up indicates that the contract is popular, and it might be snatched before the items are ready.
LanguageData.VTE.YourContractsExplanation: You can submit your own contracts. Specify the amount of the item, the mark-up and the duration. Longer contracts with higher mark-up have a higher chance of being completed. Not having enough money in the bank accounts to cover the contract reward will automatically cancel the contract.
LanguageData.VTE.ContractCompletedMessage: The caravan will arrive to pick up the contracted items in 3 days. Make sure you have enough items when they arrive. The payment will clear once the caravan leaves your area.
LanguageData.VTE.CaravanContractWillReturnMessage:
Due to the fact that your location has become dangerous, the caravan that arrived for the contracted items left the map. They will return for the items when it is safe.
Make sure you have enough items when they arrive. The payment will clear once the caravan leaves your area.
LanguageData.VTE.LetterTraderCaravanArrival: A caravan from {0} is approaching. They are collecting contracted items.
LanguageData.VTE.CaravanDidNotCollectAllItems: The caravan didn’t find the promised goods and leaves the area. You will not receive any payment.
LanguageData.VTE.BankDepositsToPutContractReward: Select bank deposits to put reward for completed contract
LanguageData.VTE.BankDepositsToPutContractRewardParti: The caravan could not obtain all of the items. They will pay {0} of the contract reward - total of {1} silver. Select bank deposits to put reward.
LanguageData.VTE.PayMoneyForContract: Contract on {0} is fulfilled. Pay money from bank deposits to retrieve the goods.
LanguageData.VTE.ContractFullfilledDesc: A contract has been fulfilled by an interested party. The funds required have been transferred to them. Cargo pods are arriving containing:
LanguageData.VTE.PlayerTransactionImpactMultiplierOpt: Player transaction impact multiplier on price fluctuation:
LanguageData.VTE.NewsPriceImpactMultiplier: Multiplier of how much news affect the market:
LanguageData.VTE.AmountOfRandomItemsToFluctuate: Amount of random item price fluctuations:
LanguageData.VTE.YouCanTakeThisLoanOn: You can only take this loan again on {0}.
LanguageData.VTE.MaximumMarketValueOfItemsInContracts: Maximum value of NPC contracts in silver:
LanguageData.VTE.MaximumMarketValueOfItemsPerPlayerWe: Maximum value of NPC contracts in percentage of wealth:
